title:
On second-order optimality conditions for $C^{1,1}$ optimization
  problems via Lagrangian functions
authors: Duong Thi Viet An and Nguyen Van Tuyen
abstract:
This paper focuses on optimality conditions for $C^{1,1}$-smooth optimization
problems subject to inequality and equality constraints. By employing the
concept of limiting (Mordukhovich) second-order subdifferentials to the
Lagrangian function associated with the problem, we derive new second-order
optimality conditions for the considered problem. Applications for
multiobjective optimization problems are studied as well. These results extend
and refine existing results in the literature.
